Version 0.3.0 10/01/2021 Github

Computation Commands

Command Version Description Documentation
Footprint 0.2.0 Create a footprint by specifying sides and optional angles. Go to Page
GroupPoints 0.2.0 Quickly create a point group and collect calculation points. No page found
Measuredowns 0.2.0 Calulate absoulte positions of inverts from a known point and field notes. No page found
Slopefrompoints 0.2.0 calculate slope from two 3D points with dialog No page found

Export Commands

Command Version Description Documentation
PrintToPDF 0.3.0 Quickly review paperspace plots and save to project folder. No page found

Project Management Commands

Command Version Description Documentation
OpenProjectFolder 0.2.0 Open the current file's project file on the computer. No page found

Miscellaneous Commands

Command Version Description Documentation
ACPoints 0.2.0 Single command to replace AutoCAD's "MULTIPLE POINT" commands. No page found
GetCogoPoint 0.2.0 Copy the info for a cogo point in ENZD (XYZD) format. No page found
Exportlocation 0.2.0 Copy the location of an aribtrary point in ENZ (XYZ) format. No page found
